import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ArticleHeader from './../ArticleHeader.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const a = { 'col':'col-3', 'height':'400px', 'image':require('./../../content/articles/homeAutomation/1.jpg'), 'image2':require('./../../content/articles/homeAutomation/2.jpg'), 'image3':require('./../../content/articles/homeAutomation/3.jpg'), } const b = { 'col':'col-3', 'height':'400px', 'image':require('./../../content/articles/homeAutomation/4.jpg'), 'image2':require('./../../content/articles/homeAutomation/5.jpg'), 'image3':require('./../../content/articles/homeAutomation/6.png'), } function HomeAutomation(props) { return(
) } export default HomeAutomation;
